about.title: About 1TAP
about.subtitle: Every click counts, every holder is a 1Tapper
about.story: Born from a love of tactical FPS games and meme culture, 1TAP is more than just a coin‚Äîit's a movement. Built by gamers for gamers, with a clear vision: bring the competitive energy of tactical gaming into the crypto world.
about.story2: No VCs. No private presales. Just pure community.
about.communityDrivenText: Every decision is voted on by 1Tappers. Your voice matters.
about.liquidityLockedText: LP locked for 6 months. Full transparency, no rug pulls.
about.equilibratedLaunchText: Balanced distribution designed for community, liquidity, and long-term growth.
about.fairLaunchText: Fair distribution designed for long-term community growth.
about.toTheMoonText: Diamond hands, stronger taps. We're making history together.
about.disclaimerNote: Remember: Memecoins are highly speculative. Never invest more than you can afford to lose.

manifesto.title: The 1Tapper Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: Our code. Our rules. Our community.
manifesto.preamble: We, the 1Tappers, united by our love of gaming and distrust of traditional finance, declare these truths to be self-evident: that all gamers are created equal, that we are endowed with certain unalienable rights, and that among these are Life, Liberty, and the pursuit of Headshots.

principle1.title: We Are Gamers First
principle1.description: This isn't about getting rich quick. It's about building something real for the community we love. Finance bros, turn back now.

principle2.title: No Whales, Only 1Tappers
principle2.description: We reject pump-and-dump schemes. We reject manipulation. Everyone here has an equal shot at success.

principle3.title: HODL Like a Pro Player
principle3.description: Great plays require patience. Diamond hands beat paper every time. Trust the process.

principle4.title: Memes Are Our Language
principle4.description: We don't take ourselves too seriously, but we take our community seriously. Culture first, profits second.

principle5.title: Transparency > Hype
principle5.description: No hidden agendas. No secret allocations. What you see is what you get. Always.

manifesto.welcomeMessage: You're now officially a 1Tapper. Check your email for exclusive updates.
manifesto.footerNote: By signing, you're joining a community that values transparency, gaming culture, and fair play above all else.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This website does not collect, store, or process personal data by default.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Our website operates with minimal data collection:
dataCollection.noPersonal: No personal information: We do not collect names, emails, or addresses
dataCollection.noCookies: No cookies: No tracking cookies are used on this website
dataCollection.noAnalytics: No analytics: We do not use analytics tools that track your behavior
dataCollection.blockchain: Blockchain interactions: Any wallet connections are handled directly by your wallet provider

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: When you interact with blockchain networks or decentralized exchanges (DEX), you are subject to their respective privacy policies:
thirdParty.wallets: Wallet providers (MetaMask, WalletConnect, etc.) have their own privacy policies
thirdParty.blockchain: Blockchain transactions are public and permanently recorded on the Base network
thirdParty.dex: DEX platforms may collect their own analytics and usage data

gdpr.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
gdpr.description: Under GDPR Article 13, you have the right to information about data processing. Since we do not collect personal data, there is no data to access, modify, or delete.
gdpr.blockchain: If you have questions about privacy or blockchain transactions, please note that blockchain data is immutable and cannot be deleted once recorded.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please reach out to us through our community channels listed on the main website.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.description: This website and its contents are provided "as is" without any warranties, expressed or implied. We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website.
useOfWebsite.item1: The website may contain technical inaccuracies or typographical errors
useOfWebsite.item2: Information may be changed or updated without notice
useOfWebsite.item3: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time

noFinancialAdvice.title: No Financial Advice
noFinancialAdvice.warning: By using this site, you agree not to rely on it for financial decisions. Nothing on this website constitutes professional financial, investment, legal, or tax advice.
noFinancialAdvice.description: Any information provided is for entertainment and educational purposes only. You should conduct your own research and consult with qualified professionals before making any investment decisions.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.description: In no event shall 1TAP, its operators, or contributors be liable for any damages including, without limitation, direct or indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, losses or expenses arising in connection with this website or use thereof.

compliance.title: Compliance with Laws
compliance.description: You are responsible for complying with your local laws and regulations. Cryptocurrency regulations vary by jurisdiction.
compliance.item1: Ensure cryptocurrency trading is legal in your jurisdiction
compliance.item2: Comply with all applicable tax reporting requirements
compliance.item3: Understand and follow KYC/AML regulations in your region

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: The content on this website, excluding third-party trademarks and references, is the property of the 1TAP community. Unauthorized use or reproduction is prohibited.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable international law, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: 1TAP is a community meme token. It has no intrinsic value or expectation of financial return. It is not an investment, security, or financial product. Do your own research.
disclaimer.responsibility: By interacting with this website or the token, you agree that you are solely responsible for your actions and acknowledge the risks associated with cryptocurrencies.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.description: Nothing on this website constitutes financial advice. Cryptocurrency trading involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for every investor. Always consult with a qualified financial advisor before making any investment decisions.

risks.title: Risks
risks.item1: High volatility and potential for complete loss of investment
risks.item2: No guarantees of value, liquidity, or market performance
risks.item3: Smart contract risks and potential vulnerabilities

yourResponsibility.title: Your Responsibility
yourResponsibility.description: You are solely responsible for determining whether any investment, investment strategy, or related transaction is appropriate for you based on your personal investment objectives, financial circumstances, and risk tolerance.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.intro: This page provides legal information about the 1TAP project in compliance with applicable transparency and disclosure requirements.

legalStatus.title: Legal Status
legalStatus.description: 1TAP is a memecoin and is NOT classified as a security. The token has:
legalStatus.item3: No centralized management with profit expectations

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All original content, including the 1TAP branding, logo, and website design, is owned by the 1TAP community project.
intellectualProperty.thirdPartyDesc: References to Counter-Strike, CS:GO, CS2, and Valve Corporation are for inspirational and descriptive purposes only. This project is NOT affiliated with these entities.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatory.noKycDesc: The 1TAP project does not collect or process personal identification data from users.
regulatory.amlDesc: Users are responsible for complying with anti-money laundering laws in their respective jurisdictions.
regulatory.taxDesc: Token holders are solely responsible for reporting and paying taxes on any cryptocurrency transactions as required by their local tax authorities.
regulatory.geoDesc: This project may not be available to residents of certain jurisdictions where cryptocurrency activities are restricted or prohibited.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.description: Any disputes arising from the use of this website or interactions with the 1TAP token shall be resolved in accordance with international arbitration principles.
